title: Ep. 166 - Professor Demands More Diversity In Fire Departments
description:
A UCLA professor claims that fire departments aren’t inclusive and diverse enough. What does this tell us about the madness of left-wing identity politics? Also, a famous Hollywood actor tries to appease the #metoo mob. Finally, I received a hilarious parenting lecture on Twitter. We need to talk about it. Date: 12-20-2018
